User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account in the Delhi Estate Luxe application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

username.description: A unique, URL-friendly username for the user, especially for professionals.

dateJoined.description: The date and time the user joined the platform.

wishlist.description: A list of property IDs that the user has added to their wishlist.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

companyName.description: The name of the company for vendors or other professionals.

servicesProvided.description: A list of services offered by a vendor.

bio.description: A short biography for professional users.

orders.description: A list of orders made by the user.

listingCredits.description: Number of property listings a user is entitled to post.

isVerified.description: Indicates if the professional user has a verified badge.

isFeatured.description: Indicates if the professional user is featured.

verifiedUntil.description: The date and time when the user's verification expires.

isBlocked.description: Indicates if the user's account is blocked.

Property.title: Property
Property.description: Represents a property listed on the Delhi Estate Luxe application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the property entity.

title.description: The title of the property listing.

description.description: A detailed description of the property.

listingType.description: Whether the property is for sale or for rent.

location.description: The structured address and coordinates of the property.

contactNumber.description: The contact phone number for the listing.

whatsappNumber.description: The WhatsApp number for the listing.

propertyType.description: The type of property (e.g., apartment, house, villa).

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the property.

bathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms in the property.

squareYards.description: The area of the property in square yards.

amenities.description: A list of amenities offered by the property.

imageUrls.description: A list of URLs pointing to images of the property.

isFeatured.description: Indicates whether the property is featured.

dateListed.description: The date the property was listed.

expiresAt.description: The date and time when the listing will automatically be removed.

listingTier.description: The tier of the listing, determining its visibility and duration.

furnishing.description: The furnishing status of the property.

overlooking.description: What the property overlooks (e.g., Pool, Garden, Main Road).

ageOfConstruction.description: The age of the property's construction (e.g., 0-1 year, 1-5 years).

status.description: The approval status of the property listing.

rejectionReason.description: The reason a property was rejected by an admin.

AppSettings.title: AppSettings
AppSettings.description: Stores global configuration settings for the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the settings document.

listingPrice.description: The price for purchasing a single property listing credit.

verifiedPriceMonthly.description: The price for a monthly 'Pro Verified' subscription.

verifiedPriceAnnually.description: The price for an annual 'Pro Verified' subscription.

listingValidityDays.description: The number of days a premium listing remains active.

definition.description: Public collection of all property listings.
Stores global application settings. Contains a single document.
